item.title: Robbie Fulks, One of America’s Great Singer-Songwriters, Mashes Up the Past and Present Tense With ‘Now Then’
item.description: Robbie Fulks is one of the funniest singer-songwriters in America, or one of the most sobering, depending on which mindset you find him or yourself in. His sensitivity, wryness and all-around musical
